snippet: A science museum was issued two citations after a tornado demonstration led to a flash fire that injured 13 people, a Nevada state official said Monday....

headline.print_headline: OSHA Issues 2 Citations After Reno Museum Fire
headline.main: OSHA Issues 2 Citations After Reno Museum Fire

lead_paragraph: A science museum was issued two citations after a tornado demonstration led to a flash fire that injured 13 people, a Nevada state official said Monday.
